item.title: Meetup - Tuesday 15th November 2016 at The ODI Node in Leeds
item.description: It's the final devops get together of 2016 at the ODI Node in Leeds on Tuesday 15th November. Once again we've pulled together a wonderful programme of talks for you: 6:45 - 7:15 : Doors open, have a chat, make some new devops friends 7:15 - 7:30 : Group updates/news/announcements 7:30 - 8:00 : Increasing agility through DevOps - Jon Milsom of Pitchero 8:00 - 8:15 : Intermission 8:15 - 9:00 : Containers with Microsoft and Docker - Marcus Robinson of Microsoft
